course.subject: MECH
course.name: Thermodynamics and Kinetics of Materials
course.description: An advanced treatment of the thermodynamics, kinetics and transport properties in solids, solutions, surfaces, and heterogeneous reactions.

reviews.author: Ccccczzzz
reviews.comment_content: The content includes two main parts:thermodynamic and kinetics of materials. The latter one is more taught in class, including nucleation, phase diagram and so on.
reviews.comment_teaching: The teacher will share papers in class. Basically the teaching is great. He is very willing to help students with their problems.
reviews.comment_grading: Only have letter grade. Don't know the actual grade of the exams/report/pre/assignment.
reviews.comment_workload:
Two exams, one literatrue report and one pre using different literatures(12mins) . Some easy assignments.
The workload is not heavy. The literature you use in the report are not limited, only required to have something with what you learned in class.
